otherNames: イエスタデイをうたってExtras, SING "YESTERDAY" FOR ME Extras SING "YESTERDAY" FOR ME Extra SING "YESTERDAY" FOR ME (ONA) SING "YESTERDAY" FOR ME Specials
synopsis: Six post-credit scenes adapting manga content not covered in the main series. Streamed exclusively on AbemaTV following episodes 1, 2, 3, 4, 9, and 12.
